metadata.title: The Light Blazes Brightly, But for Just an Instant

tracks.text: Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
Rust holds a bow and Mold holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge Stude at the wheel of the ship.
A mermaid fights a shark-faced merman.
C'tarnid's giant tentacles wrap around the Crying Innsman
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
Megumi turns into Yggdryad. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands Ranzo and a young man with gauntlets.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth. Darkness.
Text, 47, The light blazes brightly, but for just an instant
The sun shines in a blue sky with scattered clouds.
Ranzo looks down. A blond man hangs off the roof of a building.
Ranzo crouches
Ranzo pulls the blond man onto the roof.
Ranzo casually drops to the street.
A civilian flies in front of Ranzo
A woman with leaves and flowers forming a leotard, boots, gauntlet, and hair.
Small plants root to nearby walls and rubble.
2 plants shoot spear like fines from different directions. Ranzo leaps between them.
He runs while avoiding hundreds of vines.
She swings an arm, which grows into a vine whip.
He parries a vine
He lunges and appears in front of her instantly.
Label: storm Style: Michiyuki
He swings. She smiles. Her villain gauge drops.
She punches the ground.
Vines approach Ranzo and the ground crumbles.
Ranzo is 50 feet in the air. Label, Old Bones Leap
His hero gauge drops
He flies towards her, wind rippling around him. Vines from her leotard form a shield.
She's knocked back. Her HP drops to 50%
He lunges. She holds up a hand.
He stops and leaps back.
Her temple throbs
The wind blows between Yggdryad and Ranzo.
Yggdryad swings on vine ropes between buildings. Ranzo runs over a car, following.
She looks back and shoots seedlings. They land near Ranzo and shoot spears.
Ranzo dodges the barrage of spears. He cuts several.
She swings around a corner, down an alley.
She tosses a moped at him. He cuts it and it explodes.
She swings. A sword appears in front of her. She drops.
He bares down on her. She grows vines. He leaps straight up and grabs the sword.
She tosses a car at him.
He cuts the car to pieces.
Ranzo slices
In the ornate hotel lobby, Megumi uses a straw to stab ice cubes in a fizzy, light green drink. Kei approaches, carrying an orange drink. Megumi frowns, staring off.
Megumi adjusts her straw
Kei thinks
He thinks of Sylvia
She squeezes his face
He smiles at her. She blushes and fidgets.
Megumi drinks from her empty glass
Megumi blinks
The gas mask sits on the hotel room night stand. Rakuro lies back in the VR dive chair.
Montage of Psyborg Lord, Cursed Prison, Twinklepixie, a blond man, Yggdryad, Metius, and Ranzo. Ranzo cuts an X, and the words "Galaxia Heroes: Chaos" form around it.

A white object drops from the sky. It falls towards a city reminiscent of New York City. Metius, a silvery white super hero with yellow markings, lands in a dramatic pose. He looks up. Text, Player: Sunraku
Metius runs up a wall and jumps across roof tops
He brakes
In an alley, a man brandishes a knife
Metius flying kicks the NPC villain in the face.
He runs off, bouncing off walls, and running across roof tops.
He looks down
A blond man
Metius runs down the wall and flying kicks Lava. Lava holds up an arm, blocking him. Lava's health drops slightly. The lava steams. Metius's health drops slightly
Metius leaps back.
He speeds forward
Metius speeds past lava, bounces off the wall, and kicks
Lava blocks
Metius kicks lava in the back of the legs
Metius's foot hits Lava's face
Lava flies across the street
In the hotel lobby, Kei glares at gas mask Rakuro
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds Ducsuram and stands in Ruluiath.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and Fifticia.
Sunraku runs across Ruluiath, an underwater city. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, Rust, Sunraku, Akane, Mold, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
The Scarlet Whale floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and Megumi walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. The Sage of Awakening. Akane's fox mask. Psyger in a yellow demon mask. Ranzo, the old samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
Text, 37, All About Kei Uomi
Video call
Cut to black

Post-episode footnote: Ranzo's attack "Michiyuki" refers to the traditional literary genre of travel logs. However, while michiyuki is traditionally spelled road + moving, Ranzo's attack is spelled road + conquest. Note that "yuki" is not actually a valid pronunciation for the conquest character. Ranzo's attack Amatsukaze refers to the World War 2 Japanese destroyer ship Amatsukaze, and is spelled heaven + port + wind.
